name: World Bond Construction Adhesive
description: A gunnable contact adhesive for bonding a wide variety of construction materials.

name: World Brand 200 Adhesive
description: Contact adhesive for polyurethane foam & carpet.

name: World Brand 3000 Eco-Friendly Contact Adhesive
description: A quality synthetic rubber. Super strong, flexible, water-proof and chemical resistant. Will bond to natural surfaces like wood and rubber. Will also adhere to artificial leathers, rubberized fabrics, glassy metals, ceramics, hardboards, linoleum, rigid plastics & concrete.

name: World Brand 300 Adhesive
description: Contact Adhesive for rubber, metal, wood, leather, plastics, hardboard & etc.

name: World Brand 500 Adhesive
description: Contact adhesive for canvas, rubber, metal, leather, plastics, wood, hardboard & etc.

name: World Brand 600 Adhesive
description: Spray adhesive non-flammable for rubber, metal, plywood, leather, plastics, yellow foam, aluminium & etc.

name: World Brand 800 Adhesive
description: Spray adhesive medium viscosity for polyurethane foam, fibre glass & wood

name: World Brand 808 Eco-Friendly Spray Adhesive
description: A quality synthetic rubber. Flexible water-proof and chemical resistant. Good for use with simulated leathers, poromeric material, fabrics, vulanized rubber, wood, glass metals, ceramics, hardboards, linoleum, concrete and rigid plastics.

name: World Brand 8830 Polystyrene Adhesive
description: Odourless Polystyrene Foam Contact Adhesive.

name: World Brand Acetic Silicone Sealants
description: Silicone for general glazing and various DIY purposes.

name: World Brand Acrylic Sealants
description: Acrylic sealant for general glazing & various DIY applications.

name: World Brand Carpet Tile 909 Adhesive
description: Pressure sensitive adhesive for bonding most types of textile & PVC backed carpet tiles.

name: World Brand EVA 3013 Adhesive
description: Water-based adhesive for difficult surfaces.

name: World Brand G-Spray Adhesive
description: Spray adhesive heat resistant for polyurethane foam, fibre glass & wood

name: World Brand High G-Spray Adhesive
description: Heat resistant spray adhesive for polyurethane foam, fibre glass & wood

name: World Brand PVA 3008 Adhesive
description: Fast drying water-based adhesive for general woodworking.

name: World Brand PVA 3009 Adhesive
description: Water-based adhesive for parquet flooring.

name: World Brand PVA 313 Adhesive
description: Water-based adhesive for general woodworking.

name: World Brand PVA 323 Adhesive
description: Water-based adhesive for general purposes.

name: World Brand PVC Solvent Cement
description: Adhesive for PVC pipes, fittings, water pipes and ETC industries.

name: World Brand Super Glue 303 Adhesive
description: Cyanoacrylate adhesive for metal, plastic, rubber & etc.

name: World Brand Vinyl Tile 303 Adhesive
description: Adhesive for vinyl flooring.

name: World Brand Vinyl Tile 606 Adhesive
description: Adhesive for vinyl flooring, wall coverings & PVC backed carpet.
